snippet: A new vision of how we farm and how we eat, and of how to take better care of this planet’s biological resources, will be needed to provide food for a growing population.
abstract: Editorial highlights a report issued by the research organization Cgiar, which illustrates the complexity of the problem of feeding the world's growing population as the climate changes in ways that are difficult to predict.
lead_paragraph: A new vision of how we farm and how we eat, and of how to take better care of this planet’s biological resources, will be needed to provide food for a growing population.
